dataIdInfo.idAbs: Takes an input dataset of points and measures concentric circles and measures the density of points within each circle to create a network K Function.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Ben Botto, Kian Faroughi, Kenneth Spence, Kevin Choe, Victor Zepeda.

tool.name: NetworkKFunction

param.name: points
param.dialogReference:
The point's which the tool will create concentric circles around to calculate the density of points around that point to generate the network k function..

Must be an existing point feature dataset

param.name: network_dataset
param.dialogReference:
An existing network dataset to apply the random points on.

The random points will be used to generate the mean in the network k function.

param.name: num_dist_bands
param.dialogReference:
The number of concentric cirles (or distance bands) from each point to aggregate the number of points within each concentric circle, representing the density of the that specific band.

Distance bands are in meters

param.name: beginning_distance
param.dialogReference: Distance value of the first concentric circle (in meters)

param.name: distance_increment
param.dialogReference: How much to increment the distance for each band from the previous band.

param.name: snap_distance
param.dialogReference: If a point is not directly placed on the network, it will be snaped to the nearest line only if the point is within the distance (in meters) that this value represents.

param.name: out_location
param.dialogReference: Path to output the network_K feature class

param.name: output_raw_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Feature Class Name (Raw Network-K Data)
param.dialogReference: The raw data feature class containing the observed and random point computations.

param.name: output_analysis_feature_class
param.displayname: Output Feature Class Name (Network-K Analysis Data)
param.dialogReference: Name of the output network-k analysis data

param.name: num_permutations
param.expression: 0 Permutations (No Confidence Envelope) | 9 Permutations | 99 Permutations | 999 Permutations
param.dialogReference: Number of permutations to build the confidence intervals of the calculated network k function .

param.name: coordinate_system
param.displayname: Output Network Dataset Length Projected Coordinate System
param.dialogReference: Output Network Dataset Length Projected Coordinate System.

tool.summary: Takes an input dataset of points and measures concentric circles and measures the density of points within each circle to create a network K Function.
